courier.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a person or company that is paid to take packages somewhere
courier.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to send something somewhere using a courier
courier.translation[2].definitions[0].de: a person or company whose job is to collect packages, documents etc and deliver them somewhere
courier.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: Harrods had sent the garment by courier.
courier.translation[2].definitions[1].de: someone who is employed by a travel company to help people when they are on holiday, for example to give them information or organize trips to interesting places
courier.translation[2].definitions[1].ex: a courier for a touring holiday company
